archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: HRIS System
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Healthcare facilities rely heavily on specialized workforce management through HRIS platforms designed for the unique needs of medical environments. These systems manage complex staffing requirements including physician credentialing, nursing certifications, and continuing education tracking. HRIS handles payroll processing for diverse compensation structures, manages intricate scheduling patterns including call schedules and shift rotations, and tracks performance evaluations and competency assessments. The system maintains compliance with healthcare regulations regarding staff qualifications and training requirements while managing benefits administration and employee relations specific to healthcare workers.
Core Functionalities: • Employee records management • Credentialing and licensing • Scheduling and time tracking • Payroll and benefits • Recruitment and onboarding
Workflows: • Job requisition → Hiring → Credential verification → Scheduling → Performance tracking
Data Types: • Staff demographics, certifications, shift rosters, payroll details
Integration Points: • HIS: For linking staff to patient care episodes • ERP: For payroll/finance • Compliance systems: For audits
Example Software: • Workday • SAP SuccessFactors • UKG (Ultimate Kronos Group) • Oracle PeopleSoft
